title: Diligence Bilingual Complex
discription: The place Where Dreams Come true

title: 2021/2022 ENROLMENT
discription: Admissions are open to our various schools: Pre-school, Junior School, Senior School and Advanced Studies. Enrol your child

title: PRE-SCHOOL
discription: The Lekki British Pre-School programme is adapted from the curriculum guide for the United Kingdom Foundation Stage.

title: JUNIOR SCHOOL
discription: Children may join Lekki British Junior School at any time during the academic year and do not have to wait until the start of each term.

title: SENIOR SCHOOL
discription: As an international school we are proud to provide the highest possible standard of education to our students, enabling them to compete in an increasingly competitive global environment.

title: CAMBRIDGE A LEVEL
discription: Cambridge Advanced is typically for learners aged 16 to 19 years who need advanced study to prepare for university and higher education.

title: HOSTEL LIFE
discription: Our boys' and girls' hostels are very safe, neat and well-ventilated.

title: MUSIC
discription: Our music room is equipped with state-of-the-art musical instruments.

title: SCHOOL LAB
discription: The chemistry lab is fully equipped with state of the art laboratory equipment.

title: CONDUCIVE ENVIRONMENT
discription: Our classrooms and study areas are very conducive for learning.

title: WORK & PLAY
discription: Our school nurtures future leaders through work and play.
